description: An elderly Italian who escaped to Canada after killing a famous soccer player in a car accident must pay off his gambling debts by agreeing to become a human prey in a deadly manhunt organized by his debtees.
originalTitle: Ti ho cercata in tutti i necrologi

title: Saptapadii
description: A businessman's wife is determined to cure a traumatized child by risking her own family life.

title: God's Slave
description: Inspired by true events, "God's Slave" is the story of Ahmed and David, two extremist characters, one Islamic and the other Jewish, who cross their paths while being in the opposite side of the conflict in the A.M.I.A bombings that took place in 1994 in Buenos Aires.

title: Psycho
description: 23-year-old Meera meets a guy in a bus on her way to work. A casual fun chat with him soon triggers off a series of unpleasant events and Meera realizes that she has become an obsession for the guy. And when she tries to cut him off from her life, he starts stalking her. Soon, not only hers but also the lives of Meera's family members are in danger. Meera seeks help from the cops, but strangely, even they are not able to help her. She has to deal with it herself.

title: Crestfallen
description: Her parents dead, Tuva discovers that she is adopted, and she and her daughter begin trying to find their hidden roots. This leads back to the small town where she grew up, but it seems people are desperately trying to hide something...

title: The Vineyard
description: The legend of the 'Tierra De Sangre' vineyard... A tale that takes place a century ago, where love and death collide, and the mystery is darker than anyone could possibly imagine.

title: The Good Life
description: With a childhood marked by poverty and distress, protagonist Mikey has been in search of the good life, eliminating anything that didn't fit into his ideal world. After an unusual set of circumstances nearly lands him in jail, Mikey begins a new lease on life with a new love interest, Alicia. What lies beneath this seemingly perfect exterior is a much darker story filled with secrets, seduction, drugs, wealth, power and greed. Mikey is lured deeper into this underworld where antagonist Fabian Tamasio holds all the power. When Mikey's younger brother Kevin attempts to join this world things ultimately take an unsuspecting turn for the worse. Mikey is forced to choose between his family and his good lifestyle. What will he choose?

title: Sona Spa
description: The world is deprived of sleep. In Sona Spa you can buy sleep for yourself. Here Girls (Sleep Workers) sleep for you, not with you. However they can also inhabit the kingdom of their clients' dreams. The place gives you sleep but takes away your dreams.

title: Paisa Paisa
description: A man is trapped through blackmail and is kidnapped. He is allowed to go free on the condition that he will pay the kidnapper a price of 10,000 within a time limit.

title: Plot for Peace
description: A documentary that reveals the untold story of apartheid's fall, and the mysterious French businessman who was instrumental in Nelson Mandela's release from jail.

title: The Tramp
description: A young woman from a small mining town turns into a cold blooded killer after being kidnapped by a gang of ruthless human traffickers.

title: Darkness by Day
description: A rabies outbreak plaguing the small town where Virginia lives. Emilio, the father,travel to help his brother Ostrosky whose eldest daughter, Julia, is on the verge of death from a strange disease. Virginia is home alone.

title: Gurudu
description: Gurudu is a 2013 Indian Telugu film, directed by Kiran and Produced by C. D. Nagendra. The film stars Shivaji, Ritu Kaur, Kota Srinivasa Rao and Ranganath in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Manthra Anand.

title: Finders Keepers: The Root of All Evil
description: A high stakes poker game. A drug lord. A million dollars. A set of ruthless killers who want it all.

title: Pecah
description: Four men successfully robbed a bank but unfortunately one of their gang members was injured and had to be brought to the hospital. At the same time, a lady who cares for the elderly at an old folks home, brings one of its occupants to the same hospital for treatment. What ensues is the unraveling of a hidden agenda where no one suspects the least, while being pursued by a police investigator at the same time.

title: Lari
description: A gang of debt collector kidnap the ex-army's little sister, the biggest mistake that they ever made.

title: Tokak
description: A horror film about an incident at a secluded resort that takes place over the course of one night. The Tokak is a vengeful spirit from Sungai Raya who has possessed a man named Iskandar, owner of the resort. In order for Iskandar to return to a human, he has to murder and drink the blood of six women who have sinned with lust in one night.

title: Euphonia
description: The film follows the story of a high schooler, played by Madden's younger brother Will, who purchases a sound recording device in search of better sounds in his life, and slowly becomes obsessed with it. He roams his small town and nearby Atlanta, capturing audio, and starts to experience the world through those sound bites.

title: Lucid
description: A woman with increasingly disturbing and violent dreams consults a famous sleep therapist known for his controversial treatments. Her experience plummets her into the dark, twisted depths of her subconscious, grasping for her sanity.

title: Requiem for Laura Martin
description: A famous conductor divides his obsession for music with the sickly love for his muse. A strange love triangle is formed among conductor, wife, and muse; the wife ends up accepting the situation rather than lose her husband.

title: Autumn Wanderer
description: While experiencing signs of schizophrenia, Charlie meets the woman of his dreams.

title: The Stalker
description: Lucio Melillo, an armored truck guard, frustrated with the loss of his daughter's custody begins to, psychotically and violently, stalk his ex-wife and her new lover.

title: Hot Wings
description: Local criminals are earning their own piece of the pie in 2012, organ trafficking from the East End of London. When a returning son uncovers the theft of his Dad's heart, there is all hell to pay.

title: Deadly Revisions
description: International genre favorite Bill Oberst Jr. plays an amnesiac horror writer who becomes trapped in his own nightmare as terrifying images emerge that may or may not be memories, madness, or both! Remembering can be murder!

title: Zombie Apocalypse: A Love Story
description: In a world full of rotting flesh, the only immune survivor spends his life searching for a cure to this epidemic.

title: IMagine
description: IMagine is a cavernous psychological erotic murder mystery with twists and spins that will force you to question your own imagination. Dr. Rachel Tuesday is an prominent well respected psychiatrist in the small town of Uncanny Pennsylvania. She has a loving husband Donald Tuesday alongside a wonderful marriage. However, when Dr. Tuesday discovers her patient, Carol's madness is beyond her expertise she recommends Carol for further clinical help with a local mental hospital and drops Carol as her patient. In the event to protect Carol's bond with Dr. Tuesday she spirals out of control in a demented conquest to consume Dr. Tuesday's life and her marriage. The only weapon Dr. Tuesday can not combat is the weapon of Carol's mind which resurrect a dark past that threatens Dr. Tuesday and her Husband. As the mayhem unfolds the only thing that we can count on to separate truth from fantasy is our own imagination. We soon realize that nothing is safe including our own imagination. Who could IMagine?

title: Quito 2023
description: Quito 2023 is a thriller/Sci-Fi feature film that focuses on the Ecuadorian capital, some years from now. After several internal political problems, a coup has left the country under military control. Quito is the last frontier, the city has been completely fenced, enclosed and sheltered. The film starts from this point and focuses on two locations only. One, the palace where the General Ponce, a cynical and cunning man who runs the party, and is in charge of the city. The second, the headquarters of a group of young revolutionaries led by Marcos and Santiago, two guys with completely different visions. Marcosis hungry for power and strength. The other, his buddy Santiago, a man that has lost all hope for a better tomorrow. The film, without any political agenda, focuses on the hours before the revolutionaries make their last attack with the goal of overthrowing the tyranny that surrounds the city. These two places and characters are woven together to tell a story that is directly based on dialog rather than in action, in which the attitude of each one of them is analyzed, between ambition, power, humility and faith of those who expect a better future. The conclusion is that this is perhaps not more than another case of a social upheaval in Latin America, where there is really no solution in a region characterized by high ungovernability and the ingenuity of his own people.

title: Feeding Mr. Baldwin
description: A house sitter bites off more than he can chew when a dead body mysteriously shows up at the estate he's watching.

title: Voyeurs
description: Voyeurs is an Norwegian drama thriller about psychic men. It is an independent production and shot on DV. The story is about a psychic man, Samuel who falls in love, but his ability gets in the way of an ordinary life.

title: In the Void
description: Stranded in a Void after their plane crashed, Nick, Barbara, and Leo are forced to face their daemons while struggling for survival in hope they would be rescued.

title: Devil's Deal
description: In the town of Burning Bush, the Devil comes to collect the souls he was promised and will destroy anyone or anything that gets in his way.

title: Ithu Pathiramanal
description: Eldho is waiting to take revenge on Shauriyar, who killed his father and mother when he was a young boy.

title: The Woods
description: A couple (Mark & Rebecca) decide to make a documentary on Bigfoot...Mark says he will fake the "footage" by breaking twigs and leaving fake prints...after speaking to a few folks around the town and one guy who seems to be following them they head into the woods...but it seems faking it is not neccissarily an option!

title: Inner Demons the Thrillogy
description: Inner Demons is a film that explores the darkest recesses of the human mind. No matter who you are or what you believe, we are all capable of inexplicable evils. This three-story anthology shows how the human mind can be used against you. Fear can turn good people into bad people and bad people into good people - and there's nothing more frightening than the human mind.

title: Headsome
description: A deadly injured scientist is reconstructed by his twisted twin brother.

title: La méduse rouge
description: Reclusive billionaire Carl Jorstad finds himself stripped of his influence after stealing a prize delicacy, the rare jellyfish known as 'La méduse rouge', from a masochistic brotherhood of ultra-rich business leaders. Even as bizarre cosmic phenomena threaten all of humanity, Carl treks into the wilderness in a single-minded quest for revenge against those who have wronged him. Along the way, Carl carves a bloody trail through sadistic prison camp guards, small-town business entrepreneurs, and international assassins-for-hire, while matching wits with black marketeers, resurrected advertising middle managers, and the devout worshipers of a marine biologist-turned-priest. But as his surreal travels begin to take a toll on him, Carl finds himself increasingly unable to conduct business as usual.

title: The Daughter
description: The daughter of a wealthy mayoral candidate and her friends are held for ransom by a group of daring criminals.

title: ST: Keishichô kagaku sôsahan
description: Five outstanding researchers from the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department's crime lab are gathered and given powers for special investigations in response to diversified modern crimes. They are called the Scientific Task Force or ST for short. The new, elite Inspector Yurine Tomohisa becomes the ST's commanding officer. Meanwhile, a shooting rampage breaks out. Five people are shot and one of them, a female company employee, dies. The media reports this as Japan's first case of indiscriminate shooting. The ST is mobilized and Yurine heads to the crime scene. The members of ST have already arrived: Aoyama Sho, a pro filer who skipped grades and graduated from an American school with a PhD in criminal psychology; Kurosaki Yuji, a chemical expert with such an excellent sense of smell that he is able to discern the scent of poisonous substances; Yamabuki Saizo, a chemical expert who is also a monk; Yuki Midori, a physicist who also has an exceptional sense of hearing. All of them possess great abilities but are socially inept. The most eccentric of them is their leader and forensic expert, Akagi Samon. Akagi, who has a fear of other people, confines himself in his own room and analyses cases based on the information from Aoyama and the rest.

title: Headcase
description: After an ill-advised outburst gets wise-cracking Craig fired from his job, he agrees to deliver a package for a man he barely knows. The mysterious delivery turns to horror as Craig finds himself pursued by murder, mayhem and the mob.

title: Intrusive Behavior
description: Years after the institutionalizing and abandoning of their mentally unstable daughter, the Kilpatrick family becomes victim to mental instabilities of their own as their past comes back to haunt them.

title: Phantom of the Woods
description: Two young teenagers believe their worst issues are within their everyday lives and homes, until strange occurrences and mysterious deaths begin to terrorize the small neighborhood.

title: A Shameless Revenge
description: A down and out construction worker from New Jersey, Joe De Luca (Corey A. Thrush), timidly approaches Maria (Lorin Dineen) one night at a local pub ,based on pure attraction. Little did they know that a psychopathic twist on their fairytale story would turn one man's dreams of the perfect life into one woman's worse nightmares.

title: Chhadke
description: Chhadke is a Nepalese film that tells the story of two best friends. The trio clarification needed all had dreams to fulfill 'when they grew up, ' but time and destiny seem to have other plans for them.

title: Mysterious Island 2
description: A woman who is having a stay in Bangkok, whose sister has been mysteriously missing encounters ominous and strange dreams she then began to hear strange echoes and ghoulish noises, with the aid of her boyfriend they can be able to find a way to save her vanished sister and to fight the unknown evil which is running after them.

title: Signals 2
description: Inspired by the actual CIA mind-control experimentation project, MK-Ultra, 'Signals 2' is the second installment of the sci-fi feature tetralogy series, 'Signals.' The storyline continues to follow Nick Marconi, an American soldier victimized by his government's experiments upon him. Tortured by the life and death decisions he must make everyday as he meets people in need of his healing powers, he trudges on, unable to age or die, in search of a son he never knew, and yet the boy also possesses the same powers as Nick. He has also lost the power to telepathically connect with his soul mate as he used to, making his 'life-sentence' on Earth all the more unbearable.

title: Re-Entry: Grey Zone
description: In 2010, An unidentifiable life form began to appear in the central region of America. This phenomenon was soon linked to a NASA probe that was reportedly crashed somewhere in the Western Hemisphere. By 2018 what appeared as an unidentifiable life form had transformed into a devastating catastrophe. Many effected regions in the world got quarantined as "Contaminated Areas". Most of these areas are bordered by extremely large containment walls and explosive mines are placed on all patrolled waterways and bridges, Civilians are banned from entering these areas. The local and coalition military forces still struggle to wipe out the creatures around the world. The human civilization is facing extinction! 2018: Sri Lanka was among the first in Asia to face this situation. The local military has quarantined a region as an Infected Zone in Sri Lanka. A British Genetic-engineer (Kathy) arrives in Sri Lanka with intentions to re-enter the Contaminated Area to retrieve specimens of the species which she believes that will expose evidence to a cover-up the US is responsible for. The local government refuses to grant permission for Kathy to enter the Contaminated Area stating that it is too dangerous. After many attempts to convince the officials she decides to go on her own. While traveling through rural and shattered villages and towns, Kathy decides to rest in a little town very near to a Contaminated Area. She meets a young man (Gamunu) where she soon discovers that Gamunu is what the locals call "a monster slinger" who used to guide tourists illegally. Kathy convinces Gamunu to guide her through the difficult and hazardous expedition into the core of now whats known as "Contaminated Area".

title: Killing 7
description: In the reasoning network , there are seven members who share the common interest of reasoning. One day, they decided to go snorkeling for vacation. Unfortunately, they have an accident and drifted to a desert island. On the island, everyone's cell phones' signals are gone, so they are forced to stay for seven days until the next ship comes. The first night, six of them have received the missing partner's slaughtered video message at 0:10 midnight. The coming week, one person is missing night by night. Can some of them survive from the desert island? Or all of them must die there? Who is the murder? "Killing 7" will have a surprise ending for the audience.

title: Radio
description: Priya, a poor salesgirl, is given accommodation by her co-worker, Shweta, who lives in a posh apartment. But everything turns upside down when she discovers the dark side of Shweta.

title: Abductee
description: Atsushi Chiba, aged 50, wakes up one day half-dead. He's tied up in a container, being shifted somewhere. Inside the container lies a mysterious stone which doesn't give him even the slightest clue as to who the perpetrator might be, nor any idea of the fate that awaits him. As the container makes its way from truck to ship, he discovers he is one of the 200 other abductees. The container continues to make its way from ship to train, and his explanations of the situation go from "human trafficking" to "international terrorism". He begins to recall what he truly used to be, and realized what is really important in his life.

title: It's Me, It's Me
description: The world is full of me.

title: The Three Sessions
description: A chilling tale of memories and premonitions in a world where time is not what it seems.

title: Odd Man Out
description: After a horrific event, two estranged brothers are forced to face a dark, festering secret when Mike returns after being away for two decades. Now a lifetime of betrayal boils over as Matt and Mike settle their family issues once and for all.

title: Telephone World
description: Telephone World tells the story of Rachel Plasky (Elissa Dowling), who finds out she got the lead part in a new TV show in one continuous 80-minute shot.

title: Joy de V.
description: An expressionistic, gritty look at the intersection of madness and love that follows a young con artist who wakes up to discover his pregnant wife is missing.

title: Indiscretion
description: This taut and stylish thriller explores the troubled relationship between a young couple and their mysterious, charming yet unknown Italian visitor. Set in an isolated New England country home, this story takes us through the intense dynamics of a couple with long-simmering issues of mistrust which are slowly exposed once their guest arrives. His seemingly innocent nature and curious questions slowly stoke a burning fire of deception, accusations, and sexuality which explodes in violence and brutality.

title: Asabiyyah: A New Social Cohesion
description: The world has descended into chaos due to a global economic breakdown. Schools, food distribution, healthcare, gas, and means of communication are now only a memory. Democracy in the US has failed and the government has been overthrown. A new regime is hell bent on imprisoning Americans into collective work farms. In the darkness of chaos, an empirically-natured cult is gaining strength through terrorism, countless accounts of abductions and is competing with the government for power and control. If the US falls, the rest of the world may be close behind. The fate of the country, and likely the world, lies in the hands of one political idealist and two ragtag gang members. However, the government and cult are close on their heels and their safety is questionable at best.

title: Quarta Divisão
description: The Police searches Martim a young boy who is missing, why did he left his home and where is he?

title: Gokudou no tsumatachi Neo
description: Kotone (Tomoka Kurotani) is the wife of Mitsuru Kiba (Kazushige Nagashima), boss of the Kiba gang in the Saikyo Alliance. She hides a girl named Sakura Nishizawa (Rina Koike), who is chased by Azami (Natsuki Harada). Azami is the wife of Kato (Masayuki Imai), boss of the Kato gang in the Saikyo Alliance. Years ago, Azami's lover was murdered by Mitsuru Kiba. To get revenge, she married Kato. Through the girl Sakura Nishizawa, Kotone and Azami unexpectedly meet and become involved in a large conspiracy.

title: Hollywood Revelations
description: Is there a secret society that runs Hollywood? At what cost does one make to become a major player in the Entertainment Industry? This Spine tingling thriller explores this not so talked about topic. Aspiring actor John Rizzo finds himself in a tough situation when he encounters a chance in a lifetime meeting with an organization that can turn things around for him. It will have you pondering on rather such a society exist.

title: The Deathwish Video
description: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Jim Greco and Erik Ellington team up with a group of skateboarders after their favorite spots are mercilessly knobbed and destroyed by a gang of thugs posing as authority figures.

title: Andarevia
description: Marco is affected by sudden bursts of anger. He joins a sail trip for people with mental illness in the sea of Sardinia, in Italy. Something wrong will happen on the boat and nothing will be as before the trip.

title: Silver Circle
description: At the center of corruption is the Federal Reserve who has gained enormous amounts of control over America's economy, with disastrous effects beginning to show. Standing opposite, is the band of Rebels who have vowed to take back the freedom they once knew...and they won't go down without a fight. Monetary mayhem. Explosions. Romance. Silver Circle plans to take liberty filmmaking to a whole other level.

title: The Next Deathwish: A Daughter's Revenge
description: Some call him a hero. Some call him a villain. He's "John Doe: Vigilante" an ordinary man who decides to take the law into his own hands. Frustrated with a failing legal system that continues to allow violent criminals to go free, John Doe begins exacting justice the only way he knows how, by killing one criminal at a time. Soon he becomes a media sensation and inspires a group of copycat vigilantes, but who is the real John Doe, a pillar of justice or a cold-blooded murderer? You decide.

title: The Darkest Night
description: A young girl witnesses her friend's murder. The killer realizes that he has been seen. A long hunt begins that will last all night, ending in an out of service hotel where the truth of what happened will be revealed.

title: The Sky in Bloom
description: A successful human trafficker and dedicated family man is dying, but that's the least of his problems.

title: Affairs
description: Small town Mayor, George Taylor, is in a heated re-election campaign. In the midst of political controversy, a failing marriage, and a rumored affair, someone is murdered.

title: Butterflies of Bill Baker
description: Bill Baker, a kind, sensitive and content man, enjoys life's simple pleasures, such as tilling his garden or playing with butterflies. His seemingly fulfilling life is disrupted by Pavornocturnus - a night terror disorder that causes Bill to commit violent acts while asleep. His disorder can only be relieved with a unique, dangerous, and mind-altering technology.

title: Captive
description: A hiker discovers a child bound and gagged in the back of a SUV and helps her to escape, but her abductor notices the rescue and pursues the would-be hero into the woods.

title: Up & Down: Mukalil Oralundu!
description: The film revolves around eight people who were stuck in an elevator and mystery of the death of a woman.

title: L'Ferdi - Le pistolet
description: Three friends work in robberies with knives, until they come up with an idea to steal their friend's policeman's father's gun to carry out a heist that requires firearms, and soon things turn against them, conflicts appear between them and they enter into a great wave of violence.

title: Indian Warrior Ghost
description: It's 1982 a group of Scouts go on a canoe trip deep into the wilderness where they hunted by an Indian Warrior Ghost who turns Scouts into Zombies. They must use all their skills to solve the mystery or become a zombie like the other before them. "Just when you thought it was safe to sleep in the woods"

title: Alone with You
description: María is a successful woman in the eyes of society. However, after several years of fighting a tortuous past, she has not been able to regain what matters most. On this path to self-destruction, Maria starts receiving death threats.

title: The Grow
description: After losing his young son to heart disease years ago a doctor goes to extreme measures to make his living.

title: Gabrielle
description: When his publishers tell him he owes them one last book, Edward Sheehan (Michael Madsen) has little choice but to isolate himself in a cabin on a New England lake. Though his fans have come to expect truly terrifying stories from the mind of Edward, they are unaware of the morbid method he takes to get them on paper. He fears the inner depths he'll have to reach in order to make it to the final chapter. With only himself and his demons, he slowly drives himself crazy as he creates the most sinister book of his career: Gabrielle.

title: Somnia
description: A repressed, unassuming librarian named Harper is drawn into a seedy world of drugs and sexual obsession that her lover has been hiding from her. As she becomes more and more involved, she discovers and must confront the baser aspects of her own character.

title: Tiburon
description: Two brothers battle each other for control of their recently deceased mother's estate.

title: Goldberg & Eisenberg: Til Death Do Us Part
description: Goldberg is a mediocre computer programmer. Eisenberg is an emotionally disturbed thug. Unfortunately the two cross paths.

title: Welcome to the Majority
description: 9 disturbed individuals each believe they're alone after a catastrophic event none of them can explain.

title: In the Dead of Winter
description: An epidemic has overtaken the Midwest, as a deadly virus has infected every natural water source. Quarantined by dams, locks, and levees - the cold of winter makes for hell on Earth. As snow falls, more and more become contaminated; turning into insane, bloodthirsty, and violent crazies. Unaware of the chaos, Clyde, an ex-con, is released from prison. Forced to face the brutality of a viscous world, he finds refuge with Lawrence, who leads him to a "safe" haven. However, things aren't that easy. With uncontaminated water sources running low, find out what lengths Clyde and fellow survivors will go through to survive.

title: My Little Sister
description: An elder sister is concerned regarding her introvert younger sister, and is reluctant to visit the psychiatrist. What seems to be a simple matter of shyness and loneliness takes an unexpected turn, the solution becomes the problem.

title: Tode Ti
description: The greatly worshiped statue of the Holy Infant of the Ara Coeli in Rome is stolen. The police investigates the crime availing itself of the help of a criminal gang.. (Based on a true Story)

title: God's Favor
description: The people of a quiet English town in 1612 are suddenly thrown into chaos when their beloved courthouse is mysteriously set on fire and burns to the ground overnight. Suspicions of sorcery spread rapidly through the village and quickly fall upon free-spirited Faye. Will Faye be able to withstand the accusations led by pious Mrs. Godfrey and prove her innocence? Or will her trial reveal the complex web of love, religion,and revenge among the people of the town and bring forth a long-forgotten dark secret?

title: 4Reality
description: Kenny wakes up in a forest covered in blood and without memory, and soon he stands accused of murder - what is it that he can not remember and why?

title: V3
description: Told in non-linear fashion, 'V3' is a dramatic suspense film about five grad students who invent something potentially dangerous and are then confronted by a federal agent who interrogates them in a somewhat futile effort to unravel the truth.

title: Di Sini Ada Yang Mati
description: Sarah, Jasmine, and Lydia always help each other if one is hit by the problem. At one point, Lydia complained to Jasmine and Sarah that she was expecting. The child was the result of his relationship with Christian, Lydia's ex- lover.

title: Locked
description: A high school teen works at a mental hospital and hears, from a patient, of a mysterious lake house. He invites his other high school friends to party at the house. Things go from bad to worse when strange things start happening and they find out that they are trapped.

title: Nawiedzona Szosa
description: The youth group wants to delve into the subject of the regular appearance of a small girl on the provincial road 875. The apparition often appears on the street around 23-24. They search all possible sources in order to find as much knowledge about this phenomenon as possible. Fully aware of what awaits them, they go to the forest to learn the truth .

title: Lunch Break
description: When the charms of a waitress make a hit-man doubt the life he has chosen, he catches a glimpse of the life that will never be.

title: Transmigrate: The Troubled One
description: Lucy, a young woman comes back to her hometown to celebrate her newly appointed doctor of Psychiatry. Friends and old love finds her back, however there have been quite a few strange behavioral differences in Lucy.

title: Cut to Black
description: A disgraced cop is hired by a wealthy former friend to rid his estranged daughter of a petty stalker.

title: El lado oscuro de la luz
Breakdown Forest
description: When an outcast cop receives a lead to the location of a notorious assassin, he sets out to find him but walks directly into a trap. Beat up and knocked out, he wakes up in Breakdown Forest, the most dangerous place on earth; a large-scale battle arena in the wilderness. It's a fight to the death and only the strongest will survive.

title: Chambaili
description: A group of friends are led by circumstances to find themselves at the crossroads of fate.

title: Lost in Vienna, Austria
description: Revenge! That is all that Scott Tyler can think about after the death of his girlfriend Julie. After finding a mysterious tape the boundaries between fiction and reality become indistinct.

title: Vennlige mennesker
description: The owner of a chain of grocery store is having problems with his alcohol abuse, something which leads to other serious problems.

title: Sarah
description: Bridgette, a prostitute, walks into a trap that changes her life forever. Retired Hollywood producer Jim Curtis who is suffering from nostalgia, but dying of angina, hires Bridgette not for sex, but to transform this young girl into his once beautiful but deceased wife, big time Hollywood actress Sarah Stone.

title: Arjun: Kalimpong E Sitaharan
description: The film is based upon two early novels from the Arjun series...KHUN KHARAPI and SITAHORON ROHOSYO. Arjun is an aspirant detective who is influenced by his mentor/guide Amol Shome. mission. A Chinese criminal Juan Hanzi has set up base at the hill station Kalimpong. He intends to rob the Tibetan treasure buried under Kalimpongs Durpin Da Ra monastery. Incidentally, Amol Shome's old friend Bistubabu refers an NRI resident of Kalimpong to seek for advice from Amol at around the same time. That person is Mr.Sen and his father was the architect who designed the monastery and a copy of the plans are hidden in his house. An unidentified person is threatening Mr Roy. Arjun goes through the adventure of finding the whole culprit behind this operation and also decipher clues to secure the blueprints of the monastery.

title: American Bomber
description: A disgraced ex-soldier travels to New York City to become the first American born and raised suicide bomber, but an unexpected relationship complicates his plan.

title: Silencer
description: A mid-level hitman working for a mob on a college campus falls for a girl hoping for a way out, but then a new hit assigned to him complicates everything for him in this riveting bloody thriller.

title: Mosht Zan
description: This film tells the story of Mr. Adineh, who resigned from his government position and, through personal effort, has today reached an important status in terms of social and economic standing.

title: Faraway
description: Lin, a Chinese woman, and Karol, a Pole, are two innocents pulled down into the underworld of gang warfare between Poles, Chinese, and Belfast hoods. When two Polish petty thieves doublecross both Chinese and Belfast gangs, even the innocent are not untouched.

title: Final Hours
description: Secretly being drugged, Tyler can't remember the disappearance of his pregnant wife, Dawn.

title: Rio Belongs to Us
description: After 10 years away from the city of Rio de Janeiro, Marina receives a mysterious postcard that makes her return to the city. Not knowing clearly the reasons that made her return, she looks for answers.

title: Agadam
description: Awarded as the longest uncut film by Guinness World Records, Agadam is about three men who brutally murder a woman in the middle of night and bury her in an isolated place. In fact these men sell expired medicine and kill anyone who tries to expose them. But soon the ghost of the woman returns to this world and their lives are turned apart. How can a meek human survive against the wrath of a deadly ghost intent on revenge?

title: Public Bitches
description: Roxanne is a lost girl. One day, she cries for help, and Liz is the one who hears her. Liz is a cold, bitter Parisian prostitute. She introduces Roxanne to Patrick, her pimp, who instantly falls for the young woman. He asks Liz to teach Roxanne all about their world, and initiates her to sex. But Patrick knows he is going to die. He decides to leave his kingdom to Nicolas, his long-time rival and enemy. But in return, he wants Nicolas to humiliate one of his prostitutes, Ave...

title: The Unsound
description: THE UNSOUND' is a story of Dev Oberoi, who suffers from multiple organic psychotic disorder-a condition that makes his behavior extremely unpredictable and at times even violent. A failed marriage and an impending divorce, a young beautiful girl Simran is charmed by Dev's flattering ways. But you don't always get what you see. So while those who are close to him desert him, there are others who enter his life not knowing what lies ahead. Ironically, amongst those who fall in the trap of Dev's seemingly normal attractive persona is his own psychiatrist-- a beautiful woman named Joena Their torrid one-night affair happens despite joena's committed relationship with Dev's close friend Dr.Kshitij Saxena. Will she expose the deep dark secrets of Dev's violent past and present to give him a better future? And can she rescue herself from the demons of Dev's unsound mind?

title: Jäärouva
description: Four girls rent an isolated house to distract Iida, survivor of the car accident in which her parents died trapped and frozen to death in the car. But Jäärouva "The Lady of the Cold" pursues her after escaping from her in the accident.

title: Crybaby Bridge
description: Nick, Ryan, and Bill have a dream: to have their own hunting show on television. They are given the chance at a trial run, a documentary about the hunting experience. But when they cross the bridge and into the woods beyond, the hunters find themselves in the midst of the legend of Elizabeth, a vengeful specter willing to do whatever it takes to be reunited with her lost child.Can the hunters save themselves from becoming the hunted, or are they doomed to be become a permanent part of the legend of Crybaby Bridge?
originalTitle: Crybaby Bridge: The Legend of Elizabeth

title: The Maddening Descent
description: Dr. Davin Beall is arrested for his participation in a medical scheme. He is brought before renowned lawyer Callahan Marks who agrees to hear his story before he goes to court. But when this interview turns out to be a plot designed by Dr. Beall and his boss, SIR one must overcome their fears in order to survive. Includes twists, turns, and a cliff hanger ending, although this is only part one of a longer film of the same name.

title: Mindvolution
description: What it's gonna be? If you fall in love with a person that's already dead, and is in someone else's memory.

title: Nirankush
description: A dominant family history carved Arjun Shandilya as an extreme sociopath. As a grown-up psychology enthusiast, he decides to quit the job and move to a remote isolated cottage to propagate his research on self-regulated personality alteration. The experiment successfully alters his personality but towards the other extreme of human thought that recognizes no authority at all.

title: Last Rights the Series
description: Last Rights is a supernatural drama that explores the struggle of those who have answered an ad and accepted a deal from a man named Concord. Concord negotiates to allow access to Nirvana, where all worldly troubles disappear. In exchange, those who accept the deal must give him all of their possessions and stay in a house for one week. In the house are four caretakers who test each participant to see if they qualify for Nirvana or if they end up in the graveyard behind the house. The series explores and questions faith, morality, tolerance, and common sense; these are the tests of the caretakers. At the end of each week, Concord returns to the house to evaluate the test results of the participants to decide the fate of each guest and of the caretakers. Set in small town America, at the end of a charming little street. This house has stood here long before anyone can remember, or anyone can forget. It has it's own personality and once inside you truly understand what that means. Whole floors will appear and vanish, walls will move, and artifacts will be uncovered, all so the house can show you your purpose for being there. Not even the caretakers can truly understand or control the will of the house. It is truly the key to all the answers that the caretakers and guests are looking for. In season one, the house, which we find out, is possessed with the spirit of Concord's mother and Concord are waging a war of power to control the house. Caught in the middle are the guests as well as the caretakers. "Mother" and Concord alike will use these people as pawns to gain the upper hand. All this, as the caretakers try and conduct their "business as usual". Not to mention a graveyard full of spirits trying to get out. Everyone battling to keep their Last Rights!

title: Cru
description: In a lost butcher shop at the interior of Brazil, a stranger engages the services of a hit-man. What seems to be an ordered crime becomes a dangerous meeting between the characters and their pasts.

title: When Winter Screams
description: After a series a bad events, a man takes a break by going to stay at a motel many year ago, only to uncover a sinister plot.

title: Blåtur
description: A couple in their mid-twenties are about to move in together, and Silje decides to evaluate her boyfriend Kaspar. They set out for a weekend at the desolate Gusøy island asylum, where their relationship is put to the test.

title: Amnesiac
description: A gripping blend of supernatural horror and psychological drama counting the cost of loss, guilt and reckless desperation as we delve into the life of one deeply disturbed woman and the afterlife of an equally disturbed man.

title: Dead Man Island
description: Depressed musician Gus and girlfriend Fiona must return to the home of his childhood, where the gruesome murder of his father took place. Soon after arriving they discover that even more sinister disturbances lurking in the shadows at this mysterious house on an island.

title: Seagull's Voice
description: Young fiancé came to bride's village in Siberia and found that a group of local men isn't happy about their marriage. And he cannot imagine their evil plan.

title: Sciophobia
description: Five good friends spend their spring break at a beautiful secluded cabin. What begins as a fun, albeit mildly dramatic week quickly turns sour as each friend finds themselves face to face with fear embodied. Will they make it out alive?

title: Pintu Harmonika
description: An omnibus film that tells three stories about families with different life genres.

title: Mord in den Dünen
description: A female social worker who looks after girls who live on the street enquires on the disappearance of girls she had looked after. She discovers that there is a link between the disappearances and her past.

title: Stolepark
description: In this action-packed mystery thriller, 3 different individuals are lead on a thrilling journey to the darkest corners of their own world. There, they must fight a terrifying battle for their own lives.

title: Lying is done with words, and also with silence
description: An unknown man begins to convince a woman for intimacy, causing the relationship with her sister to be damaged.

title: Black Cat Whiskey
description: A housewife whose criminal husband was recently murdered is strong-armed by a group of bootleggers during the Prohibition.

title: Killing Remy
description: Two housemates discuss the pros and cons of killing Remy.

title: Little Miss Mania
description: A woman receives a diagnosis but instead of fearing the worst she uses the best parts of the illness to catapult her forward into her life's mission and as her conviction is strong, the Universe begins to conspire to help her,

title: The Green Conspiracy
description: Isabella Montoya is a Green Agent, an assassin employed by the government to eliminate CO2 emissions by eliminating the population, one sacrificial lamb at a time.

title: Affliction
description: Noah and Sidney have rescued Emily while fever-induced madness has crippled Nassau. Noah intends to stay alive and out of quarantine, but can he make it against doubt, a disease no-one understands, its crazed, pain-riddled victims, and especially Sidney's own selfish madness?

title: Legacy
description: Legacy is the haunting story of a young woman battling a terminal illness who falls in love with a handsome doctor. Her hopeful attempt at a final romantic getaway turns into a nightmare when she arrives at his family's estate.

title: Delirium
description: A family asks a young psychiatrists to be their guest and look after their father who's developed a suicidal fixation for ropes and knots. It is also entirely possible that the mental health of the guest is the real cause for concern.

title: The Making of 'Bait'
originalTitle: Staying Above Water: The Making of Bait 3D

title: Bisikan Syaitan
description: Tells about the life of married couple Soraya (Nabila Huda) and Kamil (Fizz Fairuz) who have made a bloody deal with the forces of evil in order to get the pleasure of life. They then lived in luxury as a result of the agreement. Everything turned into chaos when Soraya was arrested by the police on charges of murder. The secret of the agreement between Kamil and Soraya began to be revealed little by little when Kamil's family began to be disturbed by supernatural beings.

title: The Haunted Men
description: The final tale in the Adam Sera trilogy.

title: Canadian Film Festival James Bond Parody Promo Ad
Hunter X
description: Six years after a devastating betrayal by the Hunter Society, Hunter X returns to seek revenge, not only for himself, but for his lost love Tiffany too.

title: Road to Kingsville
description: When presented with the unthinkable, two strangers must go on the run in order to escape the clutches of the man simply known as DeGraw.

title: Roommate Wanted
description: Sean's been fired from his job and dumped by his girlfriend. To save money, he moves in with a stranger he begins to suspect murdered the previous tenant. An indie comedy thriller that riffs on Hitchcock and Polanski.

title: Knife to a Gunfight
description: Joely McCullough is terrified. She thought her best friend Abbey would always be there for her, understanding and accepting and laughing to the end. She thought Abbey was the only one who knew about her husband, the violence, her plan to escape. She thought her husband Parker wouldn't notice her moving her things into storage, slowly, methodically re-decorating her perfect house until all traces of her were gone and it was too late. Joely thought she could get away. She thought her lover Wes would save her from the perfect-looking marriage, with his solid arms and sure gaze, his easy smile and strong reassurance. She barely blinked when he showed her his bachelor suite - built secretly into a concrete storage unit -- she didn't care. She thought it didn't matter. She thought they were in love. And an hour outside the city, a dark figure stalks the storage unit hallways and metal boxes, luring victims to a silent, bloody end. Joely thought her connection to this killer would stay a secret forever. Joely was wrong.

title: Get Up
description: Four members of an illegal bare-knuckle boxing ring dig deep for their motivation to keep fighting.

title: Hotspot
description: What if you're trapped in a social network?

title: Paper, Scissors, Stone.
description: When three friends reunite in the Spanish countryside, the powerful bond they once shared is soon replaced by a deep seated grudge they have carried unknowingly for years. Facing their own dark shadows, they will be forced to play one last game that will redefine their destiny and that of an innocent child.

title: Behind the Picket Line
description: South Africa is under apartheid. Joan, adventurous and curious is unaware of what is really going on in her home country. She does not know that a liberation struggle is underway. But her peaceful life changes when she discovers that her father and her boyfriend are torturing and killing militants. The worst of it is that her maid is hiding an injured activist in the domestics' quarter. She must now act...

title: Eva's Diamond
description: When a mother embarks on a quest for truth to clear her son's name from murder, she finds herself entangled in an enigmatic chain of thrilling events linked to the mysterious man who haunted her 18 years earlier.

title: Disturban Legends
description: Kash, a teacher was happily married to Stacy, but she died unexpectedly. Now with her brother, detective Francios, Kash must join up to solve this family curse. He locates his opium dealer and gypsy friend, Ronnie to help him call the spirits from the other side. But little does he know that this curse has been going on longer than he can track it back to. Kash starts to see spirits as his Ma tries to talk sense into him and tells him to leave some stones uncovered. Through murder, sacrifices, spirits,and hell itself, Kash finds out that the people closest to him may be the ones he should've never trusted to begin with. Only after he has walked through hell will he know what it means to be the few, the rare, the disturban legends...

title: The Advocate
description: A struggling lawyer learns a demonic knowledge of mind reading and brings havoc to his personal life.

title: Curse of the Menacing Force
description: A man experiencing a strange series of frightening encounters with a menacing force leaves him wondering if he is going mad.

title: Love Sick
description: After a series of bad blind dates, a woman desperately looking for love finally meets Mr. Right, but she is unaware of the dark secret he carries.

Siberia, 2053. The whole world is a mess. Ecological disasters have ruined all civilizations. People ain't living, they have to fight to survive. They are isolated in Siberia, tens thousands kilometers away from other destroyed civilizations. There is nothing for living in that cities: no heating, no electricity, no communications. Borned after apocalypse, three gangsters are trying to find a way from the killing Siberia.

title: James Bond 007 'Ocean Royale' Fragrance Television Commercial
Ye mu jing hun
description: Set in the 1910s,a famous singer was being harassed by a few bad guys. When they were too much for the singer to handle, strange things started to happen in the mansion.

title: MultipleX
description: Six kids decide to stay in a huge movie theater after watching a gruesome thriller. But the guard is a dangerous psycho.

title: Inferno
description: Each person has traits related to the cardinal sins.

title: Self Portrait
description: A man is caught up in a web of deceit and violence, while fighting his own demons, disturbing inclinations and a dark past.

title: Degenerates
description: In a post apocalyptic world, a gang of ruthless murderers fight the living and the undead trying to survive.

title: Delirium Tremens
description: Gabriel (Maximilien Poullein), an alcoholic and agoraphobic painter struggles to cope with his nights, filled with ultra-realistic nightmares. Nina (Prisca Silie), a friend of his, assuming all of the painter's issues are linked to his addiction to alcohol, decides to assist him with his forced coming off. This is when Gabriel starts being subjected to intense artistic trances during which he inevitably paints portraits of women. Women who are inevitably found, every next day, raped and murdered.

title: Solace
description: Six people from different walks of life search for redemption in three seemingly unrelated stories that push towards a startling climax.

title: Little Rose
description: An adaptation of the folk tale little red riding hood.

title: L'amour de son prochain
description: Alain meets Estelle in unsetting circumstances. They'll then have to share a heavy secret. What they don't know is that a witness, Balthazar is watching them...

title: Midnight Matinee Psycho
description: There's a psycho on the loose. After years of getting no justice for their fathers death at a Midnight Matinee. A decision is made that someone must pay. Suddenly people start dying at Midnight Matinees seemingly killed by a serial killer. Detective Holt and metro police aren't getting any leads on who the killer could be. In the midst of this we see an upcoming actor Clyde Stevens turn into an aspiring filmmaker and marry the beautiful Sara Young. With drama, romance, comedy, and a serial killer on the loose where can you go wrong. In Tom Candela aka Jimmy Steele's return to the screen for the first time since playing Richie in Madman as Danny, Clyde's best pal. With Cameo appearances from Victor Miller (writer of Friday the 13th and creator of Jason Vorhees) and Eric Morse (writer of the F13 Camp Crystal Lake Novels). Produced and Directed by Derek Young in association with Bitchin House Blues Productions and Steve Cole. With two unique styles combining this is sure to be a film all horror fans can enjoy!

title: Murder Enthusiast
description: Authorities have finally released the found footage from a crime scene. On the tapes, are recorded documents of a day in the life of a serial killer. Her name is Katie and she is currently stalking a man called Nathan. Nathan only has a few more days until Katie kills him.

title: Extracurrikiller Activity
description: Within the walls of a typical suburban high school, a small group of students assembled to take part in a film club. Little did they know their time was almost up. After one of the students is discovered dead in a bathroom, and another goes missing, the remainder of the group bands together in an attempt to find their missing friend and solve the murder mystery. But as they spread out across the school in their search, they might not like what they find... or, what finds them.

title: Chronicles of Humanity: Uprising
description: A fugitive on the run, a corrupt government and rebelling colonies. The uprising has begun.

title: The Rally Stalker
description: It's Bike Week 2013, bikes, babes and moonshine. The party has begun, until patrons end up missing.

title: Four Drops of Poison
description: Four Drops Of Poison is a feature film consisting of Four Vignettes.

title: Last Night Forever 2
description: When a group of teenagers decides to quench their curiosity of the mystical by breaking into the school and conjuring up a spirit, nothing could prepare them for the gruesome fight they faced ahead. In this entirely student-made sequel to the 2012 film Last Night Forever, ordinary teens must find a way to rid themselves of the spirit of the crazed serial killer responsible for the massacre the school had seen 5 years beforehand. The students must beat the regular ingredients of high school drama: Love, Gossip, Confusion and Betrayal. But unlike most, the terror-stricken students must also face enemies they've never faced before: Voodoo, Murder and SACRIFICE

title: Repercussion
description: Nolan (Nate Loftin) is stuck working late. Allison (Ashley Castro) is waiting to leave work. When Nolan has to visit Ashley's for a few parts, things go wrong for both of them.

title: MindScans
description: While researching a story that centers around an interface that connects the brain to a virtual reality super-computer, investigative reporter Sara Lincoln struggles with the technology's social and moral implications as the lines between her ethics, the virtual world, and reality blur.

title: Labour of Love
description: Monica gets some life-changing news. But before she can prepare for her future, she'll have to face up to her past.

title: Jukai no futari
description: Takeuchi and Abe are failing TV directors. Seeking a chance to break out from their slumps they go to the Jukai. The Jukai is a vast, primeval forest that spreads out on the northwestern foot of Mount Fuji, where many have wandered in and never came back. Today it is widely known as a suicide destination. The directors stake out near the Jukai, hoping to find a prospective suicide, talk him out of it and film the whole procedure. While filming people at the abyss of life, Abe and Takeuchi both face problems at home. Through their encounters with people in the Jukai, they re-evaluate their lives and regain their confidence.

title: Pacsaw
description: Three young filmmakers attempt to make their first feature.

title: Lullaby
description: Matthew intends to help a stranger only to discover that the danger is closer to him than expected.

title: Involucrado
description: Josué is a young filmmaker who moved to Madrid to shoot a movie. He documents all the experience with a camera he carries, but when he arrives to his new apartment starts recording something else, a violent neighbor who beats his wife.

title: Dark Betrayals
description: A vampire named Selka leaves her boyfriend to escape his bad influence and her rough past, only to be stalked by him and his gang.

title: Specialist
description: Kusanagi plays a police detective who gets framed for a crime he didn't commit and had to spend the last 10 years in prison. However, he regains his job as a police officer and makes use of his specialized knowledge on criminal psychology to solve difficult cases.

title: The Savage Conspiracy
description: Paul Savage learns that his parents' killer is in town and starts a quest for revenge.

title: Lucid
description: After the unexpected death of her father, Max Evans retreats into her own world. Exploring the effects of lucid dreaming and sleep deprivation, Max is eventually unable to distinguish the dream world from reality. As reality becomes more and more elusive, Max must unravel the truth before it's too late.

title: The Oasis
description: A writer starts receiving video DVDs until one day he receives a video where he sees himself murdering his own brother. He has not committed such a crime and the mystery unfolds when it is revealed that the brother, a scientist, had found a way to hack into people's thoughts.

title: Coffee
description: A Psychiatric therapy session of a Coffee (substance) addict patient who is being treated in a mental asylum for murdering his wife.

title: Antennas to Heaven
description: Amidst a global religious epidemic, a solitary man stands alone on his farm against a violent cult claiming to be lead by a servant of God.

title: Jacob's Eye
description: Jacob's Eye is the story about detective Jacobs (Javier Espinoza) who is one of the best Dallas homicide detectives along with his partner Peter Cohen (Glenn Pakulak). Both men will do what ever it takes to solve a crime. Things start to go wrong when Jacob begins to have nightmares and visions about a faceless woman. The more he tries to run the more the vision gets stronger. With no one to turn to, Jacob twisted dreams and visions begin to happen in the physical. With everyone looking at his partner Peter as the killer, how will he prove his innocents? Directed by International Action Director GuGu E. Michaels.

title: Sum-ba-kok-jil
description: Mi-young is playing hide-and-seek with a doll. O-geon lives hiding his dark history and Min-su follows O-geon to revenge. One day, destiny of these three was entwined, and their story begins.

title: El Shadow
description: Amidst an unprecedented disaster, a girl and her best friends are locked down in a house with her older brother. Out of boredom, they experiment with a "talking board" and inadvertently unleash an evil spirit that haunts them.

title: Isabel
description: The thriller takes place in present city of Ostrava during one day and one night. It is a story about starting journalist Isabel, who in pursuit of smashing reportage follows a mystery man. Being naive and brave at the same time the girl finds herself trapped in a scary society in which she must fight for her life.

title: The Price
description: David King runs a successful nightclub with his beloved daughter Melanie. He is confronted by Harry, a figure from his shadowy past who holds the key to a secret David prayed would stay buried forever. Soon he is forced to make a decision that will shatter his comfortable existence and haunt the rest of his life.

title: Carpooling Shock
description: Six mysterious stranger carpool fight off the road. Unfortunately, a night storm occur and stalled their car.Then, they meet a mystery resort owner, Patrick and his wife and then a series of supernatural events happen. Strange event, strange characters, but mistrust and suspicion between them is the biggest challenge.

title: Ii
description: Two friends try to piece together the events to their recently deceased friend.

title: Kingsbury
description: A documentary about a Brooklyn artist takes a bizarre turn.

title: Guest
description: Fate unexpectedly throws up a chance for Koltsov, escapee from prison. He got ID of accidental driver that died in a shootout with the police, provoked by Koltsov. He decided to lay down before police will calm.

title: Kill Season
description: Private military contractors rotating back from Central America are being murdered. The detectives working the cases close in on a suspect, unaware that they are igniting their own private war.

title: Bloodline
description: Ray is a devoted family man to wife Penny and daughter Jesse he is also a high flying Policeman with a suspect past. When part of that past suddenly comes back to haunt him, he must protect his family, risk everything and relive explosive things he thought he had buried years ago.

title: iPsycho: A.P.P.
description: A psychopathic killer is sent to kill a woman reporter after she discovers something that wasn't exactly "on the record."

title: Miami Exposure
description: Our hero, Phil, gets his hands on a brand new photographic camera. With such a great device, he has the confidence to ask a beautiful girl, Madison, to model for him. What he did not count on, however, was that Madison has a dark past that is about to get them both into a world of trouble.

title: Die for Me: A Novel of the Valentine Killer
2013: Holocaust
description: The year is 2013. The President of the United States resigns, as the country faces the lack of a political leader. A German militia solider, Adolf Hitler, travels to the country, and decides to take charge, from a small Illinois town known as Arbor Falls to avoid all news coverage and publicity. Marion "Hawk" Hawkins is a tough, vigilante private detective. After busting one of the most wanted drug dealers in the state, he is sent out to find who is behind a recent string of murders occurring in and around the Arbor Falls area. After the kidnapping of his niece, Hawk is determined to find out who is behind all of the murders and disappearances. While doing so, Hawk discovers he is in the middle of one of the darkest, most sinister plots unleashed among the country, and it is up to Hawk to put it all to an end.

title: Morgan Family Picnic
description: A newly mutated Flu virus threatens to wipe humans of the face of the earth. Four hours after contact the infected humans will display extreme flu like symptoms. By the eighth hour, the infected has a 108 degree fever which destroys brain function. And twelve hours after contact their temperature stabilizes at 104 and an overwhelming desire for raw meat consumes them. Within days the newly born virus has spread out control. Can the humans find a way to remain alive? Or maybe one girl will unite all of the infected into an immense clan that will conquer all.

title: A Common Enemy
description: A Common Enemy is a political documentary thriller about the first elections in Tunisia after the Arab Spring Revolutions, seen through the eyes of the protagonists of the revolution.

title: The Other of Us
description: Tomas loves Sofia. Sofia loves Tomas. Nothing is stronger than love?

title: On-Line
description: It tells the harrowing conversation of a couple by Skype. Fear is on the inside.

title: Dorothy Marie and the Unanswered Questions of the Zombie Apocalypse
description: A couple faces a moral dilemma trapped amidst a zombie apocalypse.

In thrilling context, events of the movie revolve around a police officer (Idward), who is searching for those involved in a mysterious murder, in which a businessman (Sami El-Adl) is accused. Events follow as it is discovered that an officer (Ashraf Mesilhi) is involved in the case, and that there are threads linking him to the businessman's wife (Ula Ghanem), and that she is accused too.

title: Ingili
description: This is an experimental suspense thriller that has only 2 characters, 1 location, 1 rainy night and a risky bet that is too easy not to turn down.

title: Hang Out
description: When two teenage high school girlfriends; Hellen and Pinky thought it was fun for them to sneak out of their homes just to hang out for a bet, their murders remained high profile cases due to lack of evidence.

title: Decline
description: Four friends at a cross roads in their relationships head out for a final camping weekend together in the late fall, only to discover a seemingly serene and peaceful lake harboring an unusual influence on those with the misfortune to encounter it. The ensuing hours lead to the unfolding of an epidemic of global significance.

title: P3nd3jo5
description: Faces, looks, desire, love, drama, tragedy, shooting.

title: Don't You Love Me?
description: Mandy is an frustrated health care worker whose happy-go-lucky husband sets off her last nerve.

title: Guilty
description: George Brooks is a detective for the Chicago Police Department who specializes in the Serial Crimes Unit. Over the course of the last year, one killer has managed to avoid being caught; The Judge.

title: Amberpark: the Movie
description: How far are you willing to go to save your child and what if that child doesn't want to be saved? A mother fights to save her child and she has to fight her child to do it.

title: The Incidental
description: A throwback to the paranoid political thrillers of the 1970s, The Incidental follows Jake, an idealistic young journalist, as he investigates an intriguing lead, uncovering a conspiracy that just might include some of the city's most influential power-brokers. But the closer he gets to the truth, the more he realizes that he has not been searching for it, but rather been pushed towards it by unseen hands.

title: Insight
description: 17-year-old Eli is taught by Mr. Walker, a retired soldier who was involved in a failed government operation that planned to militarize hypnosis.

title: Past God
description: Raised in a strict religious family by his pastor father, James Grant moved to Hollywood for the ultimate dream of rock stardom. After falling deep into an abyss of drugs and recklessness, James learns the devastating news that his sister has committed suicide. Upset and still under the influence, he tries to piece together her possible mindset which leads him down a dark path of life altering decisions. As James navigates his newly created world of high stakes danger and secret hidden agendas from everyone he meets, flashes of the past begin consuming his fragile mind. What could have been?

title: Intentions
description: Alex and Liz go out to dinner for their first date and there appears to be one thing on Alex's mind.

title: Kodiak Fur: Lips
description: Set to Kodiak Fur's "Fade", a man arranges for an intimate encounter that turns into his worst nightmare.

title: Detour to Route 80
description: This is an anthology. 3 stories about 3 killers in one movie all with a back roads feel.

title: Nightmares
description: Harry's a young boy who at an early age lost both his parents in a home robbery. Growing up alone and with no friends he seeks comfort in a darker part of himself, and by doing so awakening the demons from his past.

title: The Cell Mate
description: A Corporate Accountant, haunted by childhood trauma, gets pulled into an embezzlement plot that he attempts to derail. Strong criminal personalities push him to make a decision that will forever alter his life.

title: Pyaar Mein Aisa Hota Hai
description: Pyaar Mein Aisa Hota Hai is a 2013 Indian Hindi film, directed by Rajeesh Kumar and produced by Rajeesh Kumar & Afsar Khan. The film stars Mohd Nazim, Rohit Rajawat, Aanamika Bawa in lead roles. The film had musical score by Shabab Azmi. Watch the full movie, Pyaar Mein Aisa Hota Hai online, only on Eros Now.

title: Meows of the Afternoon
description: Meows of the Afternoon is a parody of surrealist filmmaker Maya Deren's seminal work, Meshes of the Afternoon. Instead of starring a mysterious woman, the film stars a mysterious gray cat. The film is an unconventional narrative built around an afternoon catnap and blurs the lines between reality and dreams. With a hint of horror and a tone of suspense, this film pays homage to an avant-garde masterpiece of film history and offers a whimsical take on the feline enigma. Meows of the Afternoon is an inherently humorous re-imagining of an art film classic.

title: Das Werwolfspiel
description: After 25 years Rosa returns to her family's vacation home in the middle of nowhere. Standing deep in the woods it hides dark and well kept secrets of her youth, that she's finally willing to confront. As well as her former 'playmates'. As soon as the role play 'The Werewolves of Miller's Hollow' starts, old habits and patterns of behaviour are re-established. The game, however, seems to develop a dynamic of it's own and claims some victims.

title: Nightmare
description: Our young protagonist, Henry Sorin, undergoes lucid nightmares relating not only to his abusive past but a strange cloaked deity within an abandoned house. The story is told through the dark realm of Henry's nightmares and his cold, bleak life in reality; as the disturbances become too much for him to take, the truth is slowly exposed, and Henry can do naught but come to terms with the horror of reality. Reality protects you. But not for long. Nightmare will scare audiences of all ages with its expert use of tension and power of suggestion, and is backed by a strong, character driven story that will continuously engage and surprises audiences.

title: Alaska Johansson
description: Alaska Johansson, played by Alina Levshin ("Warrior"), is a perfect woman and in her profession as one of the best headhunters. When she will one day, almost fired from her married boss, with whom she has a relationship and at the same time learns that their relationship has no chance, she wants to kill himself with a poison cocktail. She is prevented at the last minute because, as a child enters in Halloween costume into her home and demanded sweets. Something seems with the child but not to vote. Later, the neighbor will claim that he had no child, though Alaska has seen it in his apartment ... Alaska's world gets more and more out of control, their observations are dismissed as delusions. When making her car itself and it gets into a serious car accident, it seems clear that the whole thing is a conspiracy against them. Or is there another dark secret in Alaska's life?
